name: Nonogram Puzzle File
summary: Learn about .JAP files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Nonogram puzzles, which are also known as griddlers, paint-by-numbers, hanjie, etc., are puzzles made up of cells in a grid that must be colored or left blank in order to reveal a picture. The puzzles contain numbers for each grid row and column that indicate the number of colored square sets. With this information, you must choose which squares are colored and which squares are blank in order to solve the puzzle and reveal the image.

description: File used by nonogram puzzle programs, such as QNonograms; contains a nonogram puzzle, which consists of numbers and cells in a grid.
